dict.acceptation: 强调，着重；加强语气；使突出；

sent.orig: The competition of IT already from emphasize a technology changing direction stage by stage emphasize news.
sent.trans: 信息技术的竞争已经从强调技术逐步转向强调信息。

sent.orig: Most of them emphasize determinative effect of system on modern department.
sent.trans: 绝大多数结构变革的经验分析强调了国内和国际制度对现代部门发展的决定作用。

sent.orig: We cannot emphasize too much the importance of learning English.
sent.trans: 我们再怎样强调学英文的重要性也不为过。

sent.trans: 地质异常综合评价更多是侧重于微观的、部的分析。

sent.orig: Cox and others, however, intentionally over-emphasize the use of computers in the military field.
sent.trans: 但考克斯等人有意过份强调计算机在军事方面的用途。
